Shami to Smith, 1 run length, and he picks it up from off towards deep square leg, with a characteristic whip off his pads

Shami to Labuschagne, FOUR runs whips a length ball towards deep mid-wicket to bring up a gorgeous half-century! Hasn't had to slog anything. Just batted normally and brought up his first 50 in ODI cricket
Shami to Labuschagne, 1 run length, nurdled towards point. The man has to run across to his left, and they pinch a quick one
Jadeja to Labuschagne, no run length, around off, and he plays a rasping whipped drive inside out. Dives to his left, does Kohli, to cut this off!
Jadeja to Labuschagne, no run length, driven towards cover, where Kohli fields

Jadeja to Labuschagne, OUT what a grab this time! Jadeja has tossed this up a touch, and Labuschagne plays another whippy inside out drive. Cannot keep it down, and Kohli dives low to his right and plucks this inches off the grass. Makes it look effortless, but that was a fabulous effort! Big wicket, but it might not be the worst thing for Australia
Jadeja to Starc, no run length, and he drives this towards cover. Fielder is deep and can stop this
Jadeja to Starc, no run slogs across the line. Inside edge towards fine leg

Starc looks to slog across the line, but gets it quite high on the bad, and substitute Chahal down by the deep mid-wicket fence has to move across to his left to accept this gleefully!

Saini to Carey, 1 run back of a length, jabs back at him, and he plays it to point for a quick tip-and-run

But because he was reaching for it outside off stump, he never could get the purchase he needed to clear the ropes. Big wicket for Kuldeep in his final over
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run drives to long-on, and moves to 99.
Kuldeep to Turner, 1 run helped down to third man. Turner keeps the strike
Bumrah to Turner, no run beaten by the ball keeping low. Thick under-edge

Bumrah to Turner, no run and again. This man produces on demand. He bowls yorkers with more consistency than I make a good cup of tea. And that's a real compliment
Bumrah to Turner, no run back of a length, pushed to the covers. No run in this over so far
Bumrah to Turner, no run five in a row. Almost squared him up. Can Bumrah actually bowl a maiden over here?
Bumrah to Turner, 1 run runs it down to the deep cover fielder. Turner keeps the strike again. Smith will have to wait a while longer!
Saini to Turner, 1 run quick single, was desperate to get Smith back on strike. And now, hwre's Smith on 99
Saini to Smith, no run drives smartly to backward point, who collects sharply. Turner wanted the run, but Smith is taking no chances

Saini to Turner, 1 run yorker, they scurry through for one. The throw hits Smith as he lunges to get back into the crease

Saini to Turner, OUT marvellous delivery to finish. Yorker just outside off stump, goes underneath the bat. India re stifling Australia here. And what's this? India have reviewed for a caught behind! The UltraEdge shows a spike when the ball touches the bat. He's gone! Smart review by Kohli
Shami to Smith, 2 runs driven back past the bowler and a dive from Chahal prevents it from crossing the boundary
Shami to Smith, 1 run driven down to long-on
Shami to Agar, 1 run timed to mid-off and Agar hastily runs across
Shami to Smith, 1 run cramps him for room, but Smith manages to whack it to mid-on
Shami to Agar, 1 run guides it down to sweeper cover. just 6 off the first five balls
Shami to Smith, 1 run spanks it to cow corner, but they can't manage any more than a single. 7 off the over
Saini to Smith, FOUR runs and the four finally comes! Yorker that Smith opened the face of the bat to angle past backward point. Excellent shot

Saini to Smith, SIX runs what an absolutely nonsensical shot that is. Absolutely ridiculous. Just outside off, and SMith moves across, and simply wrists it in the air over deep square leg. Sails away for six. That was all wrist.
Saini to Smith, 1 run gets a single to the offside. 13 off the first four. Can Agar support Smith here in making this a gigantic over?
Saini to Agar, 1 run finally nails the yorker. Agar digs it out and gets Smith back on strike for the final ball of the over
Saini to Smith, 2 runs worked away to cow corner, and placed it nicely enough he was able to come back for 2. 16 off the over. Australia need at least a couple more like that
Bumrah to Agar, 1 leg bye smacks Agar on the pad, and he runs through for the leg-bye. Right, Smith and Bumrah. What a contest

Bumrah to Smith, FOUR runs Smith wins the ball for now. Saw third man was inside the circle, and deliberately edges the ball fine of him to get the boundary. This is world-class batting against tough bowling

Bumrah to Smith, FOUR runs two in a row. Bumrah finally copping some punishment at Smiths hands. Another slower delivery well outside off stump. Poor delivery in truth, and Smith is too hot right now to miss out on that
Bumrah to Smith, 1 run opens the face and runs it down to the sweeper. 10 off four balls
Bumrah to Agar, 1 leg bye gets away with that. Dragged down leg, and Agar can only get his pad to it and come through for another leg bye
Bumrah to Smith, 1 run placed it around cow corner. Realised too late he could have had two. Settles for the one. Still, a dozen off that over

Shami to Smith, OUT Smith holes out to deep midwicket! Tried to play a similar shot to that flick that went for six a couple of overs ago and Iyer completes a brilliant catch charging in and diving forward. Big wicket, that, could lop about 20-25 runs off the score, potentially.
Shami to Agar, 2 runs guided through the on-side field, and comes back for two. He needs to play a big part here
Shami to Agar, 1 run inswinging yorker, that's the ball he needs to bowl as much of as possible. Agar can do little but run it off the face and take the single

Shami to Cummins, OUT and he's accounted for Cummins first ball again. Just the same way as in Rajkot. The yorker is simply too good for Cummins to get any bat on. It goes underneath and castles him first ball.
Shami to Zampa, no run Zampa tamely drives it through the covers. Surprised Shami didn't go for the yorker again
Shami to Zampa, no run driven back. Splendid over. 3 runs and 2 wickets.
Bumrah to Agar, 1 leg bye into the pads, and Agar comes through for a leg bye. Can Bumrah clean up this innings here and now?
Bumrah to Zampa, 1 leg bye dragged down legside, and Rahul fails to gather it. Lucky fine leg clears up, so it's just 1 run instead of 4
Bumrah to Agar, 1 run gets a single through the offside
Bumrah to Zampa, 1 run driven in the air to sweeper cover. Australia now up to 280
Bumrah to Agar, 1 run driven down the side for one
Bumrah to Zampa, no run finds the fielder again. Just 5 from that over
Shami to Agar, 1 run low full toss, helped along to deep midwicket from Agar, but no more than one
Shami to Zampa, OUT cleans up Zampa! Shami just keeps picking up wickets. Inswinging full ball, Zampa tries to go big, it comes off his pad and smashes into leg stump
Shami to Hazlewood, 1 leg bye backs away and Shami follows him. gets a leg bye and gets the strike back to Agar
Shami to Agar, 1 run in the blockhole again, and they only get a single
Shami to Hazlewood, 1 run gets off the mark with a run down to mid-off

Shami to Agar, 1 run superb from Shami. Finishes with another yorker, and Australia can only manage to get one off the final delivery. Superb final 10 overs from India. Only 63 runs conceded, and India need 287 to win the game, and the series.

Shami to Finch, 3 runs excellent shot. Just a jab, really, and it beat mid-off and absolutely raced down the ground. The outfield looks especially fast, and it takes all the athleticism of Virat Kohli to save one run and keep it from going to the boundary
Shami to Smith, 1 leg bye moves across, strikes him on the pads. big appeal from Shami, but it was much too high
Shami to Finch, no run defended back to the bowler
Shami to Finch, no run shorter length, defended
Shami to Finch, SIX runs absolutely remarkable shot. Pitched up, and Finch leaps on to it in a flash and essentially just drives it over mid-off, all the way for six. Brilliant stroke.
Shami to Finch, 1 wide pulls it down leg side. Make that a dozen wides
Shami to Finch, no run defended to the on-side. 11 from that Shami over
Saini to Smith, no run defended
Saini to Smith, 1 run crisply driven to mid-on from Smith, but sharp work from Yadav prevents the ball from scurrying away for four
Saini to Finch, 1 run pushes Finch back into his crease with a length ball on off stump. Thick outside edge takes it to third man
Saini to Smith, no run gets behind the line to drive it back to the bowler
Saini to Smith, no run drives on the up to mid-off. Saini's bowling especially well
Saini to Smith, no run two from the over. India managing to keep a lid on it despite all the untidiness
Shami to Finch, 1 leg bye angled down leg side, flicked off the pad
Shami to Smith, no run fidgety from Smith, a bit hurried but flicks it neatly to square leg
Shami to Smith, FOUR runs short ball from Shami, but at 136, it doesn't bother Smith much. Moves across and has an almighty hook at it. Uppish, but beats the infielder as well as fine leg
Shami to Smith, no run driven into the offside

Shami to Smith, OUT a mix-up and Australia pay for it with a wicket. Finch gone! What on earth happened there? Smith angled it to short third man, and Finch hared off for one. Smith was always hesitant, and soon enough Finch was at Smith's end. Tried to race back, but the ball was lobbed to Shami, who comfortably removes the bails
Shami to Smith, FOUR runs pierces the covers to get himself a boundary. Half-volley was there on offer, and Smith is too good to let it go, even in the moments after a catastrophic run-out
Saini to Labuschagne, no run full and straight to Labuschagne at 144 kph. The batsman blocks
Saini to Labuschagne, 2 runs on the pads again, worked away through midwicket. A bit of sloppiness to let it go through and it allows Australia to come back for two

Saini to Labuschagne, no run decent shout. Smacks him on the pads, just above the knee roll. Kohli's excited, he reviews. It's Umpire's call on impact. Just shaving the top of the stumps. Labuschagne survives
Saini to Labuschagne, no run excellent delivery. Hones in on top of off and 147kph.
Saini to Labuschagne, no run short of a length, pushes the batsman back into his crease to defend
Saini to Labuschagne, FOUR runs gorgeous shot, pierces the covers and Saini concedes his first boundary
Kuldeep to Smith, no run length, around off, and he defends towards mid-wicket

Kuldeep to Smith, 2 runs tossed up around off, and he whips this through mid-wicket. They are scurrying through for two, taking on the man in the deep. And the throw is just not collected by Kuldeep, otherwise Labushchagne could have been in trouble
Kuldeep to Smith, no run defends towards cover
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run length, and he plays this towards square leg. They think of going for two, but choose to keep it down to one
Kuldeep to Labuschagne, 1 run drives a fuller ball towards long-off
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run length, and he whips this with the turn towards long-on
Saini to Smith, no run length, and he drives this handsomely. Straight towards mid-off though. Rohit Sharma fields and then underarms his return
Saini to Smith, FOUR runs length, and he whips it off his pads. Nothing more than a little push, but he has timed this supremely. Goes to the unprotected deep square leg fence
Saini to Smith, no run length, and he shuffles across and brings his blade down to defend this close to his front pad
Saini to Smith, no run shorter, just outside off, and he looks to dribble it down to third man. Intercepted by point. Loud 'NO' to refuse the single from Smith!
Saini to Smith, no run length, slants in, and he defends this towards mid-wicket

Saini to Smith, FOUR runs length, around leg, and he whips this off his pads down to fine leg. Taken from just in front of the leg stump, and played fine enough. It's a very quick outfield, and this races away
Kuldeep to Labuschagne, no run tossed up outside off, and he drives hard. On the bounce to Kohli at cover
Kuldeep to Labuschagne, FOUR runs wrong 'un, and he goes back and punches this between cover and cover-point. Jadeja gives it a game chase, but can't reel it back in. Superb placement and timing!
Kuldeep to Labuschagne, 1 run length, turns back in from middle, and he plays with the turn towards square leg
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run slower, length ball, around 85.5kph, and he nurdles this towards square leg
Kuldeep to Labuschagne, 1 run fuller ball, around off and middle, 76.5kph this time, and he drives wide of long-off
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 wide down the leg side, they appeal for a caught-behind, but the umpire doesn't fall for it. Wide given, as the batsman misses out on a sweep
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run slow, loops outside off, 79.8kph, and he drives this down to long-off
Bumrah to Smith, no run length, comes in from just outside off, and he defends
Bumrah to Smith, 1 run shorter, just outside off, and he runs it down to third man
Bumrah to Labuschagne, no run short, and he looks to run it down to third man. Hits quite low on the bat and drops down just ahead of Rahul, who moves swiftly to his right to keep this with himself
Bumrah to Labuschagne, no run fuller, angles in from outside off, bowled at 139.5kph, and he defends with a slight forward press
Bumrah to Labuschagne, no run short, cramps him for room from outside off, and he defends towards short mid-wicket
Bumrah to Labuschagne, 1 run length, angles down the leg side, and he is able to whip it towards fine leg
Kuldeep to Labuschagne, 1 run length, around off, and he drives this past Kuldeep towards long-off
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run flighted around leg, bowled at just 73.1kph, and he drives this to long-on
Kuldeep to Labuschagne, 1 run length, around middle, bowled at 73.6, and he whips this towards deep mid-wicket
Kuldeep to Smith, no run fuller, around the pads, and he whips this to the man at square leg
Kuldeep to Smith, no run length, around middle and leg, and turns back in, takes the inside edge, and runs towards fine leg
Kuldeep to Smith, no run fuller, and he drives towards Manish Pandey at mid-wicket. Pandey dives away to his right to keep this with him
Jadeja to Labuschagne, no run length, turns away from off, and he drives this back to the bowler
Jadeja to Labuschagne, no run length, goes back to punch this back to the bowler
Jadeja to Labuschagne, 1 run slightly shorter, and he goes back to punch it down to long-on
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run flighted around off, and he drives this towards long-off
Jadeja to Labuschagne, no run length, and he goes back to punch this back towards the bowler
Jadeja to Labuschagne, no run length, drives back to Jadeja
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 leg bye fuller, down the pads, and he looks to flick this away. Off the pads, towards fine leg
Kuldeep to Labuschagne, 1 run lap sweep from outside off. Gets inside the line and plays it down to fine leg
Kuldeep to Smith, FOUR runs skips down the wicket and hits this hard back down the wicket. Shreyas Iyer at long-off, gets to the ball, but overruns it a touch. Relays it on to the fence
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run takes it on the full and drives to Iyer at long-off
Kuldeep to Labuschagne, no run length, and he drives back towards the bowler
Kuldeep to Labuschagne, FOUR runs length, swept hard and well. Smack to the right of deep square leg. Fifty partnership comes up as well!
Jadeja to Smith, no run length, nips away from outside off, and beats the outside edge, through to Rahul.
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run opens the face of the bat and runs it with the turn towards deep backward point
Jadeja to Labuschagne, 1 run goes back to punch this down to long-on
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run length, and he stretches forward to smother any turn on it. Driven to long-off
Jadeja to Labuschagne, 1 run fuller, straighter, punched down towards long-on
Jadeja to Smith, no run goes back and punches a length ball towards point
Kuldeep to Labuschagne, 1 run length, around leg stump, at just 74.9kph, and he whips this towards square leg
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run tossed up around off, and he skips forward a touch to drive this with the turn towards deep mid-wicket. Loads of wrist in that shot!
Kuldeep to Labuschagne, no run fuller, and he drives this to Kohli at cover
Kuldeep to Labuschagne, 1 run length, turns back in from outside off, and he drives this down towards long-on. At 79.8kph, one of the quicker balls he's bowled today!
Kuldeep to Smith, no run length, goes right back and flicks it towards square leg
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run length, turns back in from outside off. He hangs back and drives this to long-off
Jadeja to Smith, FOUR runs ooh, lucky! On a length, and some sharp turn. Takes the outside edge, but runs past slip down to the third man fence
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run drives a length ball away to long-off
Jadeja to Labuschagne, 1 run length, driven towards long-on
Jadeja to Smith, no run length, driven back hard at Jadeja
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run fuller, and he drives to long-off
Jadeja to Labuschagne, no run length, and he runs it towards Rohit at first slip. Goes on one bounce!
Saini to Smith, no run the pace has dropped, he's around 137 now. Defended to point
Saini to Smith, 1 run worked away to the onside
Saini to Labuschagne, 1 run opens the face of the bat and helps it to third man
Saini to Smith, no run punch off the back foot. Straight to point
Saini to Smith, no run defended back to the bowler
Saini to Smith, 1 run angled to point, and Smith keeps the strike
Jadeja to Smith, no run Smith goes back into his crease and drives back to the bowler
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run eased to sweeper cover
Jadeja to Labuschagne, no run a bit of flight and turn, driven to extra cover
Jadeja to Labuschagne, no run fuller length, almost yorked him
Jadeja to Labuschagne, no run flatter this time, and a bit more turn
Jadeja to Labuschagne, 2 runs worked away to the onside, and gets it into a gap, allowing Australia to scamper back for two
Saini to Smith, FOUR runs brings up the half-century. Full on off stump, and Smith gets a thick outside edge - possibly deliberate - that is too fine for third man to cut off
Saini to Smith, no run defended to third man
Saini to Smith, 1 run helped to third man again, this thick edge was certainly deliberate. The man in the deep cuts it off though

Saini to Labuschagne, FOUR runs feathers it away to fine leg. This is a good over for Australia. Saini wavers slightly with his line, full on middle and leg, and all Labuschagne needs to do is tickle it away for four
Saini to Labuschagne, no run looked to work it away to the cover region, beaten by the extra pace
Saini to Labuschagne, no run driven back. 9 from that over

Jadeja to Smith, FOUR runs plays it exceptionally late - this is genius. Almost takes it out of the keeper's hands, and just uses the pace to beat the in-fielder. The outfield ensured no one was stopping that
Jadeja to Smith, no run defended to extra cover
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run driven to long-off
Jadeja to Labuschagne, 1 run nearly another run-out. Ends up needing the dive to be safe. The umpires have gone up just in case. It's not out
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run turn from middle and off, Smith works it to the offside
Jadeja to Labuschagne, 1 run single to mid-off. Couple of decent overs for Australia
Kuldeep to Labuschagne, no run nicely flighted, coaxes Labuschagne onto the front foot
Kuldeep to Labuschagne, 1 run and again, slightly uppish as he drives to long-off. You sense the wrong'un coming any moment
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run a tad full. Smith gets an easy single down the ground
Kuldeep to Labuschagne, 2 runs pick up sweep shot - looked a bit risky but he got good connection on it. A little fumble on the boundary allows them to come back
Kuldeep to Labuschagne, 1 run eased down to square leg
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run wrong'un, but Smith was waiting for it. Uses the pace to work it to third man. Six from the over
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run cut away to deep point
Jadeja to Labuschagne, 1 run kept low, but Labuschagne manages to get it away to the same fielder.
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run driven to long-on. They're rotating the strike pretty effectively
Jadeja to Labuschagne, no run blocked
Jadeja to Labuschagne, 1 run wristy flick. Thought about two, but thought better of it
Jadeja to Smith, no run defended
Kuldeep to Labuschagne, 1 run nice flight again, eased to mid-off
Kuldeep to Smith, 4 leg byes down the track, and Smith has an almighty heave. He got nowhere close to it with the bat. The ball spins into his pad and runs down to third man for four. Fortuitous
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run thinks it's best to just get down the other end just as the crowd comes into it
Kuldeep to Labuschagne, no run athletic work from Kohli at cover to keep it to one run. Full-length dive sends the crowd nuts
Kuldeep to Labuschagne, 1 run deftly worked down to deep midwicket
Kuldeep to Smith, no run sharp turn again. Thick inside edge to square leg. Seven from the over, but moral victory for Yadav
Jadeja to Labuschagne, 1 run pushes him onto the back foot, cut to deep point
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run worked to the onside
Jadeja to Labuschagne, 1 run opens the face of the blade and places it to the right of the man at cover
Jadeja to Smith, no run flicked to short midwicket
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run back of a length, punched to mid-off
Jadeja to Labuschagne, no run chips it back. In the air for a fraction
Shami to Smith, no run first ball from Shami is cruched through the covers. Finds a fielder, though
Shami to Smith, no run angled to backward point
Shami to Smith, no run stayed low on Smith just as he looked to swivel and pull it away. Thick inside edge onto his pad.
Shami to Smith, 1 run runs it down to third man
Shami to Labuschagne, 1 run a bit of a slog there from Labuschagne. Didn't really time it, and it trickles down to the fielder and cow corner. The singles still keep coming, though
Shami to Smith, 1 run takes the pace of the ball, Smith just helps it to third man again
Jadeja to Smith, no run defended to the offside
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run gets the single down to wide mid-off
Jadeja to Labuschagne, 1 run makes some room for himself and gets a single down to long-on
Jadeja to Smith, 2 runs quick single on the off-side. Oh, there's an overthrow following a direct hit! They get two
Jadeja to Smith, 2 runs flighted, and Smith flicks it away to deep midwicket, and they come back for two
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run single down to long-on, and for the next 10, here's Debayan again
Shami to Smith, 1 run length, outside off, and he runs it down to third man
Shami to Labuschagne, no run length, drives this towards cover, where Pandey dives to his left to cut it off
Shami to Labuschagne, 1 run shortish, and he whips it away towards fine leg
Shami to Smith, 1 run length, and he picks it up from off towards deep square leg, with a characteristic whip off his pads

Shami to Labuschagne, FOUR runs whips a length ball towards deep mid-wicket to bring up a gorgeous half-century! Hasn't had to slog anything. Just batted normally and brought up his first 50 in ODI cricket
Shami to Labuschagne, 1 run length, nurdled towards point. The man has to run across to his left, and they pinch a quick one
Jadeja to Labuschagne, no run length, around off, and he plays a rasping whipped drive inside out. Dives to his left, does Kohli, to cut this off!
Jadeja to Labuschagne, no run length, driven towards cover, where Kohli fields

Jadeja to Labuschagne, OUT what a grab this time! Jadeja has tossed this up a touch, and Labuschagne plays another whippy inside out drive. Cannot keep it down, and Kohli dives low to his right and plucks this inches off the grass. Makes it look effortless, but that was a fabulous effort! Big wicket, but it might not be the worst thing for Australia
Jadeja to Starc, no run length, and he drives this towards cover. Fielder is deep and can stop this
Jadeja to Starc, no run slogs across the line. Inside edge towards fine leg

Jadeja to Starc, OUT two wickets in the over, but a not-so-huge loss for Australia! Jadeja pulls the length back a touch, and also slows it down. Starc looks to slog across the line, but gets it quite high on the bad, and substitute Chahal down by the deep mid-wicket fence has to move across to his left to accept this gleefully!

Bumrah to Smith, 1 leg bye length, he shuffles across to the off side and gets struck on the pads in trying to flick. Bumrah wanted to appeal this vociferously, but the line and height might have gone against him
Bumrah to Carey, no run length ball, presses forward to defend back towards the bowler
Bumrah to Carey, no run length, and he runs this towards point
Bumrah to Carey, 1 run length, and he cuts this hard, but straight to point. A direct hit at the non-striker's end, and that allows a single. Kohli won't be happy with this...
Bumrah to Smith, no run length, around off, and he looks to run it down to third man. Too close to him, and Rahul fields with his outer glove taken off
Bumrah to Smith, 1 run length, drives this towards deep point
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run length, flicked towards square leg
Jadeja to Carey, no run sweeps a length ball on middle and leg, cannot beat short fine leg
Jadeja to Carey, no run reverse sweep tried, but straight towards short third man
Jadeja to Carey, no run sweeps straight to short fine leg again

Jadeja to Carey, FOUR runs reverse sweep, fetched from well outside what would have been off, and played square of the wicket. Incredible! Jadeja holds the length back, but Carey adjusts well to meet it early, keeping it in front of square

Jadeja to Carey, no run looks for the reverse sweep again. Misses on contact, with a ball fired outside off (effectively leg). Jadeja wants a caught-behind in his favour. Not given, and India also refuse to refer this
Bumrah to Smith, 1 run short, and played down to third man
Bumrah to Carey, no run fuller, up to him around middle and leg, and he defends
Bumrah to Carey, no run length, driven back towards the bowler
Bumrah to Carey, no run short, and he ducks under this. This is a good spell of containment from the Indian bowlers
Bumrah to Carey, no run full, and he drives this back to Bumrah
Bumrah to Carey, 1 run slower ball, around off, and he picks this late, gets enough bat to play it wide of cover. Through for a quick single
Kuldeep to Carey, 1 run length, and he plays this towards point with soft hands
Kuldeep to Smith, no run length, turns back in from outside off. Strikes him on the pad, but impact would have been outside off, as he misses it
Kuldeep to Smith, no run wrong 'un, zips past the outside edge. Smith doesn't pick this off the hands
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run wrong 'un again, and he shuffles across to fetch it from outside off towards long leg

Kuldeep to Carey, FOUR runs that's a good shot! This is closer to him, and he whips this through mid-wicket. It went on with the angle from over the wicket, and he flogged it over the man at the short mid-wicket fence
Kuldeep to Carey, 1 run sweeps from outside off towards long leg to retain strike
Saini to Carey, FOUR runs top shot! Full ball, and he drives this like a bullet through extra cover. Holds the pose for the shutterbugs
Saini to Carey, FOUR runs short, and he guides this over the 'keeper down to the third man fence!
Saini to Carey, no run length, cramps him for room, and he plays this towards point
Saini to Carey, 1 run back of a length, angles in to him, and he plays this with soft hands towards short mid-wicket. Takes a quick single
Saini to Smith, no run length, just around off, and Smith tries to flick. Misses on contact, and it strikes him high on the thigh pad, and runs through to Rahul. Muffled half-appeal from Saini
Saini to Smith, 1 run short, wide, and he looks to smack this through point. Bottom-edged down towards third man
Kuldeep to Smith, no run length, wrong 'un, and goes off the outside edge as he looks to flick. Goes along the ground towards point
Kuldeep to Smith, 2 runs flighted around off, and he drives hard. Goes to the left of Rohit at long-off, and they take on his injured arm. Get through for two in the end
Kuldeep to Smith, FOUR runs slow, outside off, and he has smacked this through the cover-point fence. Bad ball, but a superb shot, with entire time on his hands
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run length, and he skips down the wicket to hit this hard towards long-on. Bowled at 78.4kph
Kuldeep to Carey, 2 runs length, around off, and he sweeps this towards deep backward square leg. A fielder sweeping at the deep mid-wicket fence gets around to his left to save two for his team

Kuldeep to Carey, 1 run loops one outside off in the air, in going for the slog sweep! Got absolutely no timing on it, and it lands limply around the mid-wicket region, with no fielder in the immediate vicinity. Lucky Carey on this occasion
Saini to Carey, 1 run back of a length, jabs back at him, and he plays it to point for a quick tip-and-run
Saini to Smith, FOUR runs length, down the legside, and Smith gets enough bat on it to run it down to fine leg
Saini to Smith, 1 run runs it down towards third man
Saini to Carey, 1 leg bye length, jags back in and beats the inside edge as he looks to flick. Off the pads towards third man
Saini to Smith, no run length, and he drives this hard towards cover
Saini to Smith, no run length, around off, and he smacks this hard. Straight, on the bounce, to cover
Bumrah to Carey, no run length, around off, and he steers this towards point

Bumrah to Carey, 1 run length, and he nearly plays it on to his leg stump, as he defends from the crease. It drops just to the left of the leg stump, and Smith has called him through for a quick single
Bumrah to Smith, 1 run length, runs it down to third man
Bumrah to Carey, no run fuller length, and he drives this towards cover
Bumrah to Carey, no run looks for the yorker, but overcooks it. Carey drives, but cannot beat mid-on
Bumrah to Carey, FOUR runs short, and he looks to drive this. Off the outside edge, and third man fails to reel it in. Off Saini's hands and touches the fence.
Shami to Smith, 1 run touched away to square leg
Shami to Carey, no run tried to run it down to third man, can't quite beat the backward point fielder
Shami to Carey, no run good delivery, seams back in to Carey, who simply played down the wrong line and found his inside edge beaten
Shami to Carey, FOUR runs clever cricket. Clears the front leg, moves away to give himself room and crunches it through the offside. Races away to the boundary
Shami to Carey, no run shows Shami the stumps again. Backed away, but couldn't quite find a productive shot to go with it
Shami to Carey, no run slower delivery, smart bowling to close out the over. Depriving Carey of the pace he was looking to use. Well-rescued over in the end
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run wrong 'un, driven away to sweeper cover
Kuldeep to Carey, 1 run drops it short, lucky Carey only finds the sweeper with a crunch through the covers
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run cut away, produces only a single

Kuldeep to Carey, OUT played with the turn, and the wicket finally comes!. Lofted it over cover, and looked a pretty good shot, in all fairness. But because he was reaching for it outside off stump, he never could get the purchase he needed to clear the ropes. Big wicket for Kuldeep in his final over
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run drives to long-on, and moves to 99.
Kuldeep to Turner, 1 run helped down to third man. Turner keeps the strike
Bumrah to Turner, no run beaten by the ball keeping low. Thick under-edge
Bumrah to Turner, no run wonderful bowling. Perfect yorker, and all Turner can do is not let the ball go under his bat
Bumrah to Turner, no run and again. This man produces on demand. He bowls yorkers with more consistency than I make a good cup of tea. And that's a real compliment
Bumrah to Turner, no run back of a length, pushed to the covers. No run in this over so far
Bumrah to Turner, no run five in a row. Almost squared him up. Can Bumrah actually bowl a maiden over here?
Bumrah to Turner, 1 run runs it down to the deep cover fielder. Turner keeps the strike again. Smith will have to wait a while longer!
Saini to Turner, 1 run quick single, was desperate to get Smith back on strike. And now, hwre's Smith on 99
Saini to Smith, no run drives smartly to backward point, who collects sharply. Turner wanted the run, but Smith is taking no chances

Saini to Smith, 1 run there it is. Runs it down to third man and brings up his ninth ODI hundred, and third against India. It's been a commanding knock. Not much of a celebration. Knows there's more work to be done
Saini to Turner, 1 run yorker, they scurry through for one. The throw hits Smith as he lunges to get back into the crease
Saini to Smith, 1 run nice timing, and what's happened now? Smith ran through for a single, and Ashton Turner wasn't even looking at him. A throw at the keeper's end would have produced a wicket

Saini to Turner, OUT marvellous delivery to finish. Yorker just outside off stump, goes underneath the bat. India re stifling Australia here. And what's this? India have reviewed for a caught behind! The UltraEdge shows a spike when the ball touches the bat. He's gone! Smart review by Kohli
Shami to Smith, 2 runs driven back past the bowler and a dive from Chahal prevents it from crossing the boundary
Shami to Smith, 1 run driven down to long-on
Shami to Agar, 1 run timed to mid-off and Agar hastily runs across
Shami to Smith, 1 run cramps him for room, but Smith manages to whack it to mid-on
Shami to Agar, 1 run guides it down to sweeper cover. just 6 off the first five balls
Shami to Smith, 1 run spanks it to cow corner, but they can't manage any more than a single. 7 off the over
Saini to Smith, FOUR runs and the four finally comes! Yorker that Smith opened the face of the bat to angle past backward point. Excellent shot

Saini to Smith, SIX runs what an absolutely nonsensical shot that is. Absolutely ridiculous. Just outside off, and SMith moves across, and simply wrists it in the air over deep square leg. Sails away for six. That was all wrist.
Saini to Smith, 1 run gets a single to the offside. 13 off the first four. Can Agar support Smith here in making this a gigantic over?
Saini to Agar, 1 run finally nails the yorker. Agar digs it out and gets Smith back on strike for the final ball of the over
Saini to Smith, 2 runs worked away to cow corner, and placed it nicely enough he was able to come back for 2. 16 off the over. Australia need at least a couple more like that
Bumrah to Agar, 1 leg bye smacks Agar on the pad, and he runs through for the leg-bye. Right, Smith and Bumrah. What a contest

Bumrah to Smith, FOUR runs Smith wins the ball for now. Saw third man was inside the circle, and deliberately edges the ball fine of him to get the boundary. This is world-class batting against tough bowling

Bumrah to Smith, FOUR runs two in a row. Bumrah finally copping some punishment at Smiths hands. Another slower delivery well outside off stump. Poor delivery in truth, and Smith is too hot right now to miss out on that
Bumrah to Smith, 1 run opens the face and runs it down to the sweeper. 10 off four balls
Bumrah to Agar, 1 leg bye gets away with that. Dragged down leg, and Agar can only get his pad to it and come through for another leg bye
Bumrah to Smith, 1 run placed it around cow corner. Realised too late he could have had two. Settles for the one. Still, a dozen off that over

Shami to Smith, OUT Smith holes out to deep midwicket! Tried to play a similar shot to that flick that went for six a couple of overs ago and Iyer completes a brilliant catch charging in and diving forward. Big wicket, that, could lop about 20-25 runs off the score, potentially.
Shami to Agar, 2 runs guided through the on-side field, and comes back for two. He needs to play a big part here
Shami to Agar, 1 run inswinging yorker, that's the ball he needs to bowl as much of as possible. Agar can do little but run it off the face and take the single

Shami to Cummins, OUT and he's accounted for Cummins first ball again. Just the same way as in Rajkot. The yorker is simply too good for Cummins to get any bat on. It goes underneath and castles him first ball.
Shami to Zampa, no run Zampa tamely drives it through the covers. Surprised Shami didn't go for the yorker again
Shami to Zampa, no run driven back. Splendid over. 3 runs and 2 wickets.
Bumrah to Agar, 1 leg bye into the pads, and Agar comes through for a leg bye. Can Bumrah clean up this innings here and now?
Bumrah to Zampa, 1 leg bye dragged down legside, and Rahul fails to gather it. Lucky fine leg clears up, so it's just 1 run instead of 4
Bumrah to Agar, 1 run gets a single through the offside
Bumrah to Zampa, 1 run driven in the air to sweeper cover. Australia now up to 280
Bumrah to Agar, 1 run driven down the side for one
Bumrah to Zampa, no run finds the fielder again. Just 5 from that over
Shami to Agar, 1 run low full toss, helped along to deep midwicket from Agar, but no more than one
Shami to Zampa, OUT cleans up Zampa! Shami just keeps picking up wickets. Inswinging full ball, Zampa tries to go big, it comes off his pad and smashes into leg stump
Shami to Hazlewood, 1 leg bye backs away and Shami follows him. gets a leg bye and gets the strike back to Agar
Shami to Agar, 1 run in the blockhole again, and they only get a single
Shami to Hazlewood, 1 run gets off the mark with a run down to mid-off

Shami to Agar, 1 run superb from Shami. Finishes with another yorker, and Australia can only manage to get one off the final delivery. Superb final 10 overs from India. Only 63 runs conceded, and India need 287 to win the game, and the series.

In what used to be the Premier League's marquee clash, Liverpool host Manchester United later tonight. They're on course to lift the trophy, but can they break Man City's points record, or match Arsenal's Invincibles? A close assessment of their run-in suggests they will fall just short.
Right, so Debayan will take you through the first 10 overs after the lunch break. Meanwhile, how about a football teaser?
It's KL Rahul who will open alongside Rohit Sharma.
Cummins to Rahul, no run short, just outside off, and he lets it pass. Bowled at a good pace, and he knows better than to fiddle with it
Cummins to Rahul, no run short, angles in, and he defends this towards point
Cummins to Rahul, no run length, nips back in, and he defends towards point
Cummins to Rahul, 5 wide way down leg side, and Carey cannot collect. Big swing after pitching down leg stump, and moving further away
Cummins to Rahul, no run back of a length, shapes back in from outside off, and he defends
Cummins to Rahul, FOUR runs terrific drive! Presses a bit forward, transfers his weight, and eases into a cover drive to one fractionally fuller
Cummins to Rahul, 1 run shorter length, off the inside edge and on to pad. Goes towards point and they pinch a single
Starc to Rahul, 1 run length, straightens in from middle, and he plays it with the inward movement wide of mid-on
Starc to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs width, across him, and he lays his bat it again. Well placed, as he gets it to the left of point. Just a stand-and-deliver drive!
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run length, outside off, slants across him, and he leaves

Starc to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs short and wide, and he guides this over point. Wayward start from Starc, and Rohit is ensuring he makes the most of scoring opportunities. Seems to have hit the boundary skirting on the full!
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run length, around off, and he drives towards cover

Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run length, straightens after pitching around leg. He looks to flick, and gets rapped on the pads. Australia have a think about a review, but choose not to go for it, after all
Cummins to Rahul, no run length, nips in from outside off, and he leaves
Cummins to Rahul, 1 run length, down the leg side, and he whips this away towards fine leg
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run edged, but drops short of Carey! Length, around off, and he looks to drive. Goes off the toe-end, and dies on Carey as he collects to his right
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run length, straightens into him from around off, and he flicks this towards short mid-wicket

Cummins to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs fuller, on the pads, and he flicks this effortlessly over deep backward square leg. Maximum!
Hazlewood to Rahul, no run length, nips away from outside off, and Rahul leaves
Hazlewood to Rahul, no run full, and he drives this firmly towards mid-on
Hazlewood to Rahul, no run length, a bit of away swing, and Rahul misses out as he tries to bash it through covers
Hazlewood to Rahul, no run back of a length, angles in, and he defends this towards square leg

Hazlewood to Rahul, no run back of a length, nips in and tucks him up. Defended from the crease, and for a while, that rolls on to his feet and falls on the off side. Rahul didn't really know where that had gone
Hazlewood to Rahul, 1 run length, and he pushes this wide of short mid-wicket for a tip-and-run
Cummins to Rahul, no run back of a length, tucks him up, and he plays towards short mid-wicket
Cummins to Rahul, 1 run length, and a handsome drive with a forward press. Warner dives away to his left and keeps this down to one
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, 1 run short, angles in, and he plays this towards deep square leg

Cummins to Rahul, 1 run length, just wide of off, and he cuts this away. Uppish, and drops short of third man. Went really quickly, and it would have been a brave call to come forward to try for a catch!
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs length, but down the leg side, and he has placed this wide of short fine leg. Superb placement from Rohit Sharma!
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, 1 run short, outside off, and he runs this down to third man
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run length, away swing from outside off, and he leaves
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run fuller, and driven towards mid-on
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run length, around off, and he blocks
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run well bowled! Outside off, a bit of nip away, and beats the outstretched bat as he looks to come forward and defend
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, 1 run length, around off, and he looks to cut. Off the outer edge of the bat, along the ground, towards third man

Hazlewood to Rahul, no run length, comes back in from outside off, and knocks him on the pads as he looks to whip it away. Perhaps a touch too high, as the Australians choose to withdraw their appeal after an initial burst of excitement
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs short, wide, and he throws his bat it. Off the lower edge of the bat, but past Carey and runs away fine towards third man
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run length, down the leg side, and he plays a glance. Stopped by short fine leg, diving away to his right
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs slower ball, around off, and he places this beautifully. Past point, and races away to the deep point fence!
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, 1 run length, driven to the left of Warner at wide mid-off, and they pick up a quick single
Cummins to Rahul, FOUR runs uppish, but past point again! Length, but width offered, and Rahul opens the face of his bat to steer this towards third man. Races away after going past the man at point
Cummins to Rahul, no run length, jags back in, and he defends
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run fuller length, and he drives this towards mid-on
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run length, angles in, and he defends from the crease
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run length, just around off, and opens up Rohit. Misses the outside edge, and the off stump, by a sparrow's whisper!
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run short, angles in, and he defends this with a back-cut towards point
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run fuller ball, around middle, and he looks to flick. Stopped at short mid-wicket. Looked like a change of pace at first glance, but went at 143kph!
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run length, defended towards mid-wicket
Agar to Rahul, 1 run begins with aflighted delivery on leg stump, flicked on the leg side
Agar to Rohit Sharma, no run defended to cover
Agar to Rohit Sharma, no run nice loop on these deliveries. Defended back to Agar
Agar to Rohit Sharma, no run pushes him back slightly, blocked
Agar to Rohit Sharma, 1 run worked away to square leg
Agar to Rahul, 1 run quick single, a hint of confusion but they ultimately scamper through. Tidy first over
Hazlewood to Rahul, 1 run persists with that nagging off stump line, smart single on the off side
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run angles it back in, defended
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, 1 run drifts ever so slightly down leg, Rohit helps him down to fine leg
Hazlewood to Rahul, 1 run shorter delivery, pulled down to fine leg
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run good delivery, on a length and coming in. Fended to mid-on
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run swings back in. Rohit defends. Mildly alarmed the ball was going back onto his stumps, but no need to fear. Another tidy over from Hazlewood
Agar to Rahul, 1 run uppishly played. Wide, flighted delivery that Rahul reached for
Agar to Rohit Sharma, 1 run driven down to long-off
Agar to Kohli, no run well fielded. Driven to mid-off and Warner puts the dive in to save a single
Agar to Kohli, 1 run gets off the mark with one to sweeper cover
Agar to Rohit Sharma, 1 run driven to long-off. Nice little spell for Australia just before drinks
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, 1 leg bye hits him on the pads, but this one's definitely missing leg stump
Hazlewood to Kohli, 1 run back of a length, Kohli goes back inside his crease and turns the strike over
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run off stump line, just short of a length. Defended. Hazlewood is giving nothing here right now
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length, blocked
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run flicked to midwicket
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs lovely shot, just angled the bat to third man and what perfect timing. That boundary was needed, all the better it comes off Hazlewood from India's perspective.
Agar to Kohli, no run flight, Kohli dead-bats it
Agar to Kohli, no run drags this wide outside off stump. Sharp work from Warner to stop the run
Agar to Kohli, 1 run nice turn there, but Kohli times it sweetly and gets one to deep point
Agar to Rohit Sharma, no run magnificent from Warner. Puts in another dive and mid-off and stops one more
Agar to Rohit Sharma, 1 run brings up his half-century! What form he's in. The crowd erupt, but lots of work to be done still
Agar to Kohli, 1 run keeps the strike with a flick to the onside
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run starts off with one on middle and leg, driven to long-on
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, no run darts it through and smacks Rohit on the pad. Enthusiastic appeal, but that's missing leg
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 1 run slightly frenetic slog from Rohit, didn't really time it. Just out of Warner's reach.
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run crisply struck to long-on again

Zampa to Kohli, no run driven straight back to Zampa
Agar to Rohit Sharma, no run defended to backward point
Agar to Rohit Sharma, no run thick outside edge, sharp work from the backward point fielder stops it from running away
Agar to Rohit Sharma, no run can't get this away, good start from Agar
Agar to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs gets the boundary! Poor delivery, dropped it short and flat, and Rohit just needed to open the face of the bat and help himself to four
Agar to Rohit Sharma, no run blocked
Agar to Rohit Sharma, no run driven back to Agar. Four off the over, and we have drinks!
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run pushes back and punches it through cover
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, no run tried to run this past short third man
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, no run dead-batted
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 1 run low full toss, sweetly driven to wide long-off
Zampa to Kohli, no run no spin there, goes straight back to Zampa
Zampa to Kohli, no run angled to short third man, can't beat him either side, though. Kohli looks mildly miffed by that
Agar to Rohit Sharma, no run flighted down leg side, Rohit drives it to the fielder
Agar to Rohit Sharma, no run got a bit of grip and turn. It was in the air for a moment, but away from any fielders
Agar to Rohit Sharma, no run wicket-to-wicket, defended
Agar to Rohit Sharma, no run blocked
Agar to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs full, and Rohit slices it down to point, and calls for a couple straightaway. They come back with ease. Another tight over, though
Agar to Rohit Sharma, no run just that two off this over. The run rate drops below 5 for the first time
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run driven to long-off
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, no run almost yorked him, comes straight back to Zampa
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 1 run smeared to deep cover
Zampa to Kohli, no run that nearly shaved the outside edge. Kohli beaten with the turn, gives the pitch a look of admiration
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run gets off strike to long-off
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 1 run another easy single to wide long-off, and for the next 10 overs, here's Debayan. Play nicely, people!
Labuschagne to Rohit Sharma, 1 run dropped short, and he goes back and thrashes this towards deep mid-wicket. There's a man in the deep for that shot
Labuschagne to Kohli, 2 runs tossed up, around leg stump, and he squeezes this with a flick of the wrists between deep backward square leg and mid-wicket. Picks two
Labuschagne to Kohli, 1 run short, and he goes back and thrashes this towards deep point

Labuschagne to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs short, and that's out of here! The Labuschagne experiment is not working all that well. Too short, and he rocks back and sends that about 12 rows deep into the middle tier over mid-wicket
Labuschagne to Rohit Sharma, 1 run quick single pinched with a little flick towards mid-wicket
Labuschagne to Kohli, no run short, and he goes inside out with a drive. Banged straight to Warner at that position
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 1 run fuller ball, and he drives this against the turn towards long-on
Zampa to Kohli, no run flighted, around middle, and he drives this firmly back to the bowler
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run slider, goes on with the angle towards leg stump, and he whips it off his pads towards square leg
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 1 run flighted, and he drives this towards long-off
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run flighted around middle, and he flicks this towards long-on
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 1 run fuller, and he whips this towards deep backward square leg
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run length, angles it in, and he defends this back towards the bowler
Starc to Rohit Sharma, 1 run length, a touch of width, and he drives this hard towards deep backward point
Starc to Kohli, FOUR runs length, width, and Kohli just leans into it, and puts this away past cover. Fine shot!
Starc to Kohli, no run fuller, angles back in, and he drives this back hard towards Starc. Does well to field this in his follow-through
Starc to Kohli, 1 run fuller, but down the pads, and he whips this towards long leg
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run fuller, towards the leg stump, and he checks an intended on-drive. Just short of mid-on
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run fuller, around off, and he drives this firmly, along the ground, to long-off
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 1 run full, and drives with the turn towards long-off
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run a little shorter, and he goes back and whips this towards mid-wicket
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, no run fuller, drives this back to the bowler
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 1 run length, and he stretches forward to punch this towards long-off
Zampa to Kohli, no run wrong 'un, and he stretches forward to flick this away. Hits him on the pad. Zampa appeals, but knows this was sliding down leg with the angle. Good ball, nonetheless!
Starc to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs wide, and he stretches and uses that width to guide this between point and third man. Great timing on that!
Starc to Rohit Sharma, 1 run width again, good length, and he throws his bat it. Smith dives away to his left and saves three for his team!
Starc to Kohli, no run short, just around off stump, and he hops to negotiate the extra bounce. Goes to point
Starc to Kohli, no run waft at one outside off. Width on offer again, and he fails to make contact with this
Starc to Kohli, no run short, zips back in across from outside off, and he plays it towards point again. Wants a single, but turned down very quickly by Sharma
Starc to Kohli, 1 run short, and he runs it down to third man
Zampa to Kohli, no run length, around off, and he pushes this to cover
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run length, and he goes back to shorten this, plays it against the turn with a push down towards long-on
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, no run length, outside off, and he defends towards point

Zampa to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs short, and he has taken full toll of this. May have slipped out of Zampa's grasp as he looked for the flipper, but it sat up nicely. Rohit deposits this deep over mid-wicket
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, no run tossed up around off, and he drives this back towards the bowler
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, no run slower, just around off stump, and he drives back towards the bowler. Bowled at 86.7kph
Agar to Kohli, 1 run fuller ball, and smacked back at him. Off his fingers, towards mid-wicket. He seems in a bit of pain, but that's his non-bowling arm
Agar to Rohit Sharma, no run wide of the crease, fuller ball on leg stump, and he drives to short mid-wicket
Agar to Rohit Sharma, no run fired in quicker, a bit flatter as well, and Rohit defends towards short mid-wicket
Agar to Rohit Sharma, 1 run skips down the wicket, and Agar throws it wider. Off the inner part of the bat, as he ends up thrashing this towards long-on
Agar to Kohli, 1 run fuller, on middle and leg, and driven with the turn towards long-off
Agar to Rohit Sharma, no run fuller ball, and he gets down to play the lap sweep. Struck on the pads, but perhaps going down leg
Finch to Kohli, 1 run fuller, on the pads, and he whips this away towards short fine leg
Finch to Rohit Sharma, no run fuller, and he presses forward to defend. Pitched around middle and leg
Finch to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs short ball, and he has gone towards the mid-wicket fence again. More elevation, but similar distance. DO NOT SERVE UP SHORT BALLS TO ROHIT AT CHINNASWAMY!
Finch to Rohit Sharma, no run length, and he presses forward to defend towards point
Finch to Rohit Sharma, 1 run full, and he drives this towards long-off
Finch to Kohli, 1 run length, driven towards long-on
Agar to Kohli, 1 run fuller, around middle and leg, and he smashes this with a roll of the wrists towards long-on
Agar to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs length, down the leg side, and he uses the pace on the ball to guide this wide of deep square leg
Agar to Rohit Sharma, no run length, and he presses forward to drive. Off the top part of the blade, but keeps low enough to not carry
Agar to Rohit Sharma, no run length ball, driven towards point
Agar to Rohit Sharma, no run fuller, around off, and he drives this back towards the bowler. Slower through the air as well
Agar to Rohit Sharma, 1 run fuller, around middle, and driven towards the sweeper at extra cover
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs length ball, and he swings this towards mid-wicket. Just clears the man in the in-field!
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, 1 run runs a short ball towards third man, and that's his century! Eighth against Australia, and his love affair with the Chinnaswamy continues too
Hazlewood to Kohli, no run back of a length, nips in, and he runs it towards point
Hazlewood to Kohli, 1 run length, a bit of width, and he goes hard through covers. There's a sweeper in the deep, though
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, 1 run short, and he whips this towards deep square leg
Hazlewood to Kohli, no run length, driven towards point, and Steven Smith dives away to save a potential boundary
Agar to Rohit Sharma, 1 run single to long-off
Agar to Kohli, 1 run lofts it over extra cover with the turn. Not perfectly timed, but gets the single
Agar to Rohit Sharma, 1 run driven down to long-on
Agar to Kohli, 2 runs smartly dabbed down to short third, who has a chase. The runs flowing comfortably now, and this is getting out of Australia's hands
Agar to Kohli, no run good delivery, pushes Kohli back, who defends on the leg side
Agar to Kohli, no run and again. Tidy end to the over
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, 1 run smeared to square leg without any real timing on it. Lands well short of the fielder, though
Hazlewood to Kohli, 1 run thick inside edge onto the pad, they scurry through for one

Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs what a way to bring up the hundred partnership. Just leans into an on-drive and it sails away over long-on for six. Smashing Hazlewood hasn't been easy but it looks no trouble for Rohit
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, 1 run and gets off strike with a tickle to fine leg
Hazlewood to Kohli, FOUR runs what kind of shot is that? Kohli gets underneath a bouncer and seemingly without looking at it, pulls it to the square leg boundary. India motoring now
Hazlewood to Kohli, 1 run works it to the on-side. 14 off that Hazlewood over
Zampa to Kohli, no run driven to mid-on
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run easy single to long-off
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, no run googly, hits Rohit on the pads, but was always turning too sharply
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 1 run another googly, Rohit runs it down to fine leg

Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 1 run dances down and smashes it to long-on. Decent over for Australia in the context of things
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, 1 run flicked away to midwicket
Cummins to Kohli, FOUR runs short and wide, begging to be hit and Kohli obliges, crunching Cummins through cover. India are cantering

Cummins to Rohit Sharma, 1 run opens the face of the bat and gets down the other end

Cummins to Rohit Sharma, 1 run eases it to third man
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 1 run single to long-on
Zampa to Kohli, no run gave it extra air, driven to cover
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run driven out to wide long-off
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 1 run runs down the wicket to milk him for another single. All they need to do, really
Zampa to Kohli, no run googly. Not sure Kohli read that. Thick inside edge
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run sharp conventional turn this time, Kohli opens the face and keeps the strike
Cummins to Kohli, 1 leg bye thumps Kohli on the pad, Carey had to dive to prevent four leg byes
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, 1 run angles it down to third man

Cummins to Kohli, FOUR runs pushes back and spanks Cummins to cow corner. That's an emphatic way to bring up your half-century. Not his most fluent one, but with Rohit at the other end, what he's doing is more than enough
Cummins to Kohli, FOUR runs that's sigh-inducing from Kohli. One of the shots of the day. Slightly full, and Kohli leans into the straight drive. That was perfect, and why wouldn't you hold the pose?
Cummins to Kohli, 2 runs wide of off, and he deserved to go for four, there. He has Starc's dive at deep point for keeping it down to two
Cummins to Kohli, 1 run thwacks it to sweeper cover. 13 from that over, and we take drinks now
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run thick inside edge to the leg side
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, no run flicked to square leg
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, no run dances down the track, the googly hits him on the pads outside the line
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run worked away to the leg side
Zampa to Iyer, no run defended to midwicket
Starc to Kohli, 1 run closes the face of the bat and they scamper through for a quick single
Starc to Iyer, 1 run short, tapped into the offside and they take on Labuschagne, who picks it up sharply and gets a direct hit. He's in comfortably, though
Starc to Kohli, no run angled to backward point
Starc to Kohli, 1 run run down to third man
Starc to Iyer, 1 run another easy single
Starc to Kohli, 1 run helped to fine leg. Asking rate creeps over 6 once more
Agar to Kohli, FOUR runs drops it short, and thumped away to cow corner. Poor ball and Kohli is too good not to latch on to it
Agar to Kohli, 1 run quick single
Agar to Iyer, 1 run Iyer gets his captain back on strike
Agar to Kohli, 1 run opens the face and guides it to long-off
Agar to Iyer, no run defended
Agar to Iyer, no run bit of turn, and Iyer blocks
Starc to Kohli, no run drives to extra cover, who collects sharply
Starc to Kohli, 1 run flick of the wrist to midwicket
Starc to Iyer, no run back of a length, defended. It's gone to Warner, so they decide against risking a single
Starc to Iyer, FOUR runs excellent shot. Rocks back and cuts it to cover point. Iyer has done very well here. Rotating the strike and pouncing on to bad ball
Starc to Iyer, no run deflected to short third man
Starc to Iyer, no run driven to cover, sharp work prevents the run. Here's Debayan to see you, and maybe India, though
Agar to Kohli, no run length, around off, driven towards point
Agar to Kohli, 1 run off the edge, and flies through the vacant point region! Tries to close the face of the bat on a length ball, and it flies off the outside edge
Agar to Iyer, 1 run length, around off, and he taps it with the tide towards point
Agar to Kohli, 1 run length, and he runs it down towards short fine leg
Agar to Iyer, no run length, down the leg side. Tickled around the corner, and wants a single to square leg. Turned down by Kohli
Agar to Iyer, no run length, driven to cover

Starc to Kohli, 1 wide length, he walks across and looks to flick this. Goes down leg side, and it has been called a wide. Australia choose to review this, but they are told they don't have enough time for this. Seemed to sound like thigh pad, or perhaps even the bat. Looks like thigh pad
Starc to Kohli, no run length, flicked towards short mid-wicket
Starc to Kohli, 1 run length, wide of off, and he drives this towards deep point
Starc to Iyer, 1 run short, across him from over the wicket, and he plays it down towards point

Starc to Kohli, 1 run length, and he presses forward and picks up a single to mid-off. This went slowly to him, played as it was with soft hands, so he is safely home even with a direct hit at the non-striker's end

Starc to Iyer, FOUR runs full ball, around off, and he can drive this through the cover-point region. Starc has been quite poor with his direction today, and the Indians have made him pay for that each time
Starc to Iyer, no run short, angles across him. He looks to tap this to square leg, and sets off. Kohli sends him back

Hazlewood to Iyer, FOUR runs fuller ball, and he backs away and smacks this inside out. Good shot by Iyer. Pre-empted the change in length from Hazlewood!

Hazlewood to Iyer, FOUR runs backs away and slashes this, one bounce into the deep point fence. Top shot again from Iyer. Kohli encouraged him throughout to play his shots, and Iyer met fire with fire on each occasion. India inch ever closer...
Zampa to Kohli, FOUR runs short of a length, and swung around between long-on and deep mid-wicket. Top shot!
Zampa to Kohli, 2 runs short again, outside off, and he has eased this into the deep backward point region. Hares through for the second
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run wrong 'un, turns in from outside off, and he takes the bottom hand off to run this down towards fine leg
Zampa to Iyer, no run length, and he goes back to defend after covering the turn across him
Zampa to Iyer, no run length, presses forward to defend this
Zampa to Iyer, 1 run length, goes back and punches this towards deep point

Starc to Iyer, 1 run short, and he pushes this towards deep point
Starc to Kohli, no run short ball, outside off, jagging back in. He looks to thwack this back, but under-edges this towards point
Starc to Kohli, 1 run short, and slightly slower than he anticipates. Gets down on his knee, and then guides it towards deep square leg with the periscope. Smiles all around...
Starc to Iyer, SIX runs short, angles across him, and Iyer swats this over deep mid-wicket. Big six! An exclamation mark over this chase by India, in some ways
Starc to Iyer, FOUR runs backs away, and swats a fuller ball towards extra cover. One bounce, and into the fence
Hazlewood to Kohli, 1 run fuller, down the leg side, and he whips this towards fine leg
Hazlewood to Iyer, 1 run length, around off, and he drives this towards the sweeper at cover-point
Hazlewood to Kohli, FOUR runs short, and he dismisses this over mid-wicket. Nobody back at the fence, and that's four closer to that hundred!
Hazlewood to Kohli, no run yorker, and he digs it out towards deep mid-on

Hazlewood to Kohli, OUT he's gone through him! Full ball, and Kohli shuffles across and tries a swipe towards mid-wicket.
